description:
“When I was a kid I wanted to be a ninja,” JC told us. “Or maybe a cowboy.”

“Well being here is really neither of those things!” I laughed. “So what do you think?”

“This is the best time...” he said, “ever!”

I think we embarrassed him a little by taking him to the basketball court, though.

“I’m not really a basketball player,” he said. “But I’ll try!”

He landed a few shots, but he was laughing the whole time.

“I know,” he said. “I kind of suck.”

I loved how modest and fun he was. He made all of us smile!

He’s got a nice little body too, with a little fur on his chest and a nice, thick cock!
title: JC
